en.start:
GM, fren! Welcome to Token Fate.
Enter your token and reveal your fortune. Gain guidance from the divine Universe and big data.
What is the fate of my token today?
en.info:
At the core of Token Fate, we offer a big data-driven token indicator and a meditation app designed for the fast-paced crypto space, where hundreds of tokens are launched each day.

NFA warning
While we discuss tokens and provide recommendations, all decisions are ultimately yours. It is essential to Do Your Own Research.

How should I understand the results?
Listen to your heart and let the market carry you. There are never definitive right or wrong answers, but we do leverage big data and AI like never before to enhance our insights.

Need Further Support?
Join our Telegram group @HajimeAI and our moderators will be happy to assist you.
en.quest:
Ah, seeker of fortune, what token whispers to your today?
Share with me the ticker that calls to you. Remember, it must begin with the sacred "$" sign.
en.risk: Ah, the final inquiry before destiny unfolds: What does your heart echo regarding the dance of risk?
en.recommended:
Also my dear fortune seeker, here lies today's token selection.
While I do not urge you, the choice is yours to click and trade right here, right now.
en.recently_connected:
Thank you, my dear.
Now, with the stars aligned, it is time to reveal the fate of your token.
en.connected: Now, with the stars aligned, it is time to reveal the fate of your token!
en.unconnected:
Fantastic! 
You stand at a crossroads, a decision awaits: 
Choose how you wish to proceed on this journey.
en.invalid_amount:
Invalid amount. Please enter in the format BTC:0.1,
Cancel to input /cancel
en.invalid_format:
Invalid format. Please enter in the format BTC:0.1,
 Cancel to input /cancel.
